metadata.title: CVE-2024-24750 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Undici is an HTTP/1.1 client, written from scratch for Node.js. In affectedversions calling `fetch(url)` and not consuming the incoming body ((orconsuming it very slowing) will lead to a memory leak. This issue has beenaddressed in version 6.6.1. Users are advised to upgrade. Users unable toupgrade should make sure to always consume the incoming body.

criterions.comment: node-undici package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
node-undici package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
